document_data.name: Knights of Ilmater
document_data.mainbody: The '''Knights of Ilmater''' were a knightly order of [[paladin]]s devoted to [[Ilmater]], the Broken God
document_data.Description: The order comprised fifty paladins who fought together under a red-and-grey banner bearing a holy symbol of Ilmater. An ultra-heavy cavalry unit, they were an incredibly dangerous force on the battlefield.
document_data.Activities: The Knights journeyed constantly from battle to battle, always seeking a worthy cause to fight for. They had no bases or homes, choosing to live without this security or comfort, as per their faith.
document_data.History: Under the leadership of the suicidally brave [[Korr|Korr of Ilmater]], in the [[1363 DR|Year of the Wyvern, 1363 DR]], the Knights of Ilmater came to [[Daggerford]]'s side and joined its alliance during the [[Second Dragonspear War]] against the forces of [[Dragonspear Castle]].
